website_summaries.verdict: Offering impressive lip repairing properties, this lip mask earns top marks for staying put on lips all night long and providing significant moisture.
pros: A little bit of this product goes a long way, making the 0.3 ounce pot long-lasting
Comes with easy twist off cap
Mask does not transfer to pillowcase
Works quickly and is effective in adding moisture to lips even after wearing lipstick all day
cons: Instructions on packaging are not printed in English

customer_reviews.title: Very very very hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and hydrating! Stays on all night and is still thick on my lips when I wake up. This would be perfect to carry around and apply a very thin layer during winter months! (This product is NOT made for eyelashes however after I would spread this overnight mask on my lips, I'd use the leftover on my finger and swipe it across my eyelashes before I went to sleep. My eyelashes grew way longer doing this.)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Patterson

customer_reviews.title: so if you don't like thick, this may not be the product for ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my lips moisturized for hours (through the night). It's still on in the morning when I wake up and I don't have to use a whole lot of this product. It is thicker than your average convenience store lip gloss or chap stick, so if you don't like thick, this may not be the product for you. I love it! Nice mild scent (hint of ginger) that's not too overwhelming. I was previously using Laneige Lip Mask and I prefer this Ginger Sugar lip mask over that. My lips started to peel after using that product, but I've had no issues with this lip mask. Great value and I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Chun

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I definitely read the reviews on this product before purchasing. I read what I thought would work for me, and it honestly has not. I bought it for my sunburned lips to add some moisture back in overnight. The product is very thick. Not that I have a problem with it being thick, but it’s just a warning. It will stay on all night and it’ll be on in the morning. However, my lips don’t actually feel moisturized at all. Even with a thick layer of this stuff. My lips feel exactly the same. Super dry. Honestly Aquaphor does a much better job. I assumed since this was a lip mask, it would work well. Sadly, it does not.
customer_reviews.author: SarD

customer_reviews.title: feels like you've applied Aquaphor to your lips
customer_reviews.text: Look, if you're trying to dupe Laneige's lip sleeping mask, THIS IS NOT A CLOSE DUPE AT ALL. This product works as an okay humectant, and that's about it. It's sticky, feels like you've applied Aquaphor to your lips, but it smells nice and gets the job done. For the record, I have both this product and the Laneige, and the Laneige is, hands down, much better. It's basically an entirely different product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't noticed significant improvement in my lips moisture while ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed significant improvement in my lips moisture while using this, but I can say this product is still on in the morning when I wake up. It has a pleasant smell and does seem to help, I just have REALLY dry lips. Use this after you apply a healing ointment, it makes it stay in place all night!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: It's works great at hydrating lips while you sleep. Especially great for smokers if they put it on the lips and smear it up around the lips as well to cover "smokers lines". It has to be removed with a dry cloth and some oil based cleanser. Use the applicator wand to apply, if you get it on your fingers it's hard to wash off. Wipe the applicator wand off with a clean, dry tissue after applying. This works great in cold, dry winter weather when Chapstick won't work. But, it's to be worn while you sleep. You can't eat or drink anything after you apply it or it will get all over and be hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Noho Cycle Chic

customer_reviews.title: Authentic?
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I got this it worked wonderful of me. It was thick very hydrating and my lips were always soft and hydrated. The second one I bought I noticed the package looked different and the consistency of the product was different as well. This did not work at all like the first one I bought. Could it be that is not Authentic? or maybe different formula? Very disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User 8745

customer_reviews.title: Works as described but VERY sticky
customer_reviews.text: It's very moisturizing and kind of exfoliating, in that it makes my lips super smooth. I only use it at night, and any dry patches on my lips the night before can be wiped away in the morning, but it's also *very* sticky. It doesn't come off with water, and I'm not really trying to wash my lips with face wash every morning, so I kind of just let it be, but that part is not awesome. It comes in a pretty enormous pot for a lip balm, so I assume I'll be using it for months and months as long as I don't get too fed up with the stickiness.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great on my sensitive lips!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this lip-mask now. I'm super sensitive to anything irritating on my lips and I'm not fond of a lot of scents or flavors in lip products, so I took a risk and tried this. It's fantastic! No burning and it has a really appealing, mild fragrance and no real flavor. Even tho it says Ginger, there is no spicy burniness to it. It is sticky, but not offensive and it stays on my lips all night. I like this so much I'm looking for other products in the same line.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Can not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wore this almost consistently for 2 weeks and a couple of days ago I had some sort of reaction to prolonged use. An area to the right of my mouth became dry, scaley and just ever so itchy. Thought it was a weird sunburn Because I had to walk home in the sun the day before. Area near corner of mouth there also irritated. Kept putting this on lips thinking they were dehydrated from the sun and now a couple of days later I have woken up to the entirety of my lips as well as just around them, very dry and starting to flake. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rei

customer_reviews.title: Okay, kinda bland
customer_reviews.text: I think I was expecting more noticeable results. The product is really sticky and because I have cats I’ll wake up with cat hair on my lips. This doesn’t happen with other lip products I use. It’s petroleum like and the ginger isn’t noticeable at all. It’s not even sweet so I don’t know about the sugar part. I had this product in my cart for a long time since it was recommended by buzzfeed but it isn’t that great for the price. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Repurchasing - holy grail product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sept 9 2018. I’m reordering today, March 19 2020. I used it almost every night and many daytimes in between. This stuff is intense. It’s thicker than Vaseline but magically not sticky and will last the whole night on your mouth. You’ll wake up with the best lips you’ve ever had cause it really just holds any moisture in. The smell is slight and disappears quickly. There is no taste. Both of these things are nice. You get a huge amount so if you run through it faster than I did, I’ll be super surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kerns Burns

customer_reviews.title: It's all True
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this stuff is SUPER sticky. Yes, this stuff has a very light scent. I don't believe that it tastes like anything, really. Yes, this stuff STAYS PUT. Yes, it's a little hard to get off sometimes. YES, this stuff moisturizes YES, this lip mask WORKS! I'm so very pleased. I suffer from very chapped lips in the winter months. I really have hope that I might finally have a winter where I'm not irritated the entire time by chapped, peeling lips. This stuff stays on all night. You really don't need a lot to apply. I wouldn't recommend wearing this in the daytime, it's too sticky. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dalikah

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing but broke me out
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you ONLY get it on your lips, and use it sparingly. It broke the skin around my lips out in little blemishes (I don't have an issue with breakouts) But it feels great and smells good too, I think I will try it again and be very careful
customer_reviews.author: eximas_lex

customer_reviews.title: The instructions on the back of the jar are in ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on the back of the jar are in a different language so I have no idea if I am using the product correctly. It works well to hold in moisture but is a little oily and tends to rub off on my pillow/sheets. It is also hard to wipe off in the morning (if that is even what I am supposed to do?) so I bought this product to help  The combination of the two worked miracles on my severely chapped lips!
customer_reviews.author: aflaute

customer_reviews.title: Will never go without
customer_reviews.text: This stuff truly works! I have sensitive skin and lips. I’m obsessed with chapsticks, balms, masks, but I have to be careful because I can get a weird red ring around my lips. This product not only doesn’t irritate me but it works great. I put it on at night and I can still feel it in the morning. My son had cracked lips to the point they were bleeding, I put this on and in 2 days they were totally healed. I ended up ordering the stick of this bc I want an extra to carry in my purse (although that product has mixed reviews). Also the container is pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffney Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this yesterday and put it on before bed. It is thick, but it stayed on my lips all night. I went to bed with slightly chapped lips and when I woke in the morning it was still on there and I took a wash cloth and rubbed it off. It took all the dead , chapped skin off my lips and they are smooth, supple and have been all day. My dry lipstick that I love even went on a lot smoother. Very satisfied with this lip mask..does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Hlove

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works like a charm. I like it better than my Laniege lip mask because it stays put for hours even after you wake up. I moved from a humid to a super dry climate recently and my lips are not about it. They get constantly chapped and bleed no matter how much chapstick I lather on. So lip masks have been a godsend. This specific one is my favorite so far. I wish it smelled a little more gingery but that would mean more fragrance and I’m totally okay without the extra chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Tar on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never actually done this but this product is like what I imagine tar feels like. Seriously - its sticky and gross feeling and no matter how much water and soap you use, it NEVER comes off. Your best bet it to just dilute it across your skin to end your suffering. Who cares if it’s moisturizing when it causes that much strife. AVOID! Get you some Aquaphor jelly - it works 1002939 million times better.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think dry, cracked lips is painful and super unattractive. It gets relatively cold in my part of the country so this product is definitely what you would call an ounce of prevention. The ginger scent is light but the mask itself is dense and when applied you can absolutely feel the moisture and protection sinking in. If you're a matte lipstick type girl...this is a must have for the end of the day! Oh and pay attention to the Amazon ingredients description because the writing on the back of the product is all in Korean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer nu Kuhn hjklpnyu

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised (:
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I moved to FL, my lips have been chapped the whole time. I used Burt's bees lip balm and it wasn't cutting it. I am so happy I found this over night lip mask! Before bed, I gently exfoliated my lips, then placed a thin layer of the mask on my lips and I woke up with my lips hydrated and soft! It was a pleasant surprise! Will reorder when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to do much by itself, but it's wonderful combined with an oil
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a week and it didn't seem to do much on its own. However, if you apply a thin layer of squalane oil to your lips first, and then layer this on top as an occlusive, it's miraculous. I have not needed to use lip balm at all since I began using that combo overnight each night. It has a faint ginger scent and no taste.
customer_reviews.author: victoriafee

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed about this... I read the amazing reviews and took a chance. Normally I use Vaseline on my lips overnight but wanted something more nourishing. Vaseline is GREAT and this product is just okay. In fact, the two nights I’ve used it, my Lips are actually much more chapped and dry than before :-(
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: love it and buying for gifts too
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night. I get dry lips in the winter,I think due to the air and combo of matte lipstick I wear. This stuff works. I slather it on before bed and there is still a bit of it on my lips when I wake up. I wipe it off in shower, sometimes I lightly scrub my toothbrush over my lips to help get off the dry skin too. I purchased for my sister this year as part of her Christmas gift because I love this stuff so much.
customer_reviews.author: TrixiN

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! Stays put on lips all night, seals in moisture like nothing I have used before. Have been derma-rolling and the lips can become very dry afterwards. This is the answer and also the answer for anyone suffering from dry lips period. It is listed as a night balm, but I use it in the morning too before putting on lipstick. Cannot recommend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Slightly better than laneige, but not significantly more moisturizing. Won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: Resembles the texture of the Laneige lip sleeping mask. I bought this as people were comparing it to the laneige one and saying that this was more moisturizing. It’s more moisturizing by just a tad bit but for my dry lips, doesn’t have a significant difference than when I put on petroleum jelly or cera ve healing ointment. It does however stay on longer than those two because of it’s thicker consistency. Smells nice and works alright but I probably won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: LASTS!  Real Deal! 💋
customer_reviews.text: Good by DRY! Finally a lip balm that really stays on! Put balm on this 730a a.m. and at 1p it was still on! Its a clear balm not a standard gloss or regular lip product..its different in a goood way. Alone or can use it w my beauty .. i put on a lipstain (or lipstick) and top w this and lasted 6hrs+ soft sheer shine. Super faint smell of clean ginger-sugar. Texture of vaseline (no comparison otherwise) to touch but different slip to it, it stays for real!!!!!💋 Unisex honestly. He will like lasts crazy long if out in the dry cold air!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: Both attempts to use this product has left my lips a sticky tacky mess that when I try to remove it, it tears up my lips. Not hydrating and just a mess. Would recommend AGAINST use of this product. I would like my money back but amazon won’t let me return.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Holy Crap It's Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am s.h.o.c.k.e.d. at how well this little lip mask works! I'm currently taking Accutane - which dries out your entire body especially the lips - and I used this last night right after I scrubbed the dead skin off in the shower and it's still on this morning and my lips are buttery soft! It has a beautiful citrus-y scent. THIS IS A HOLY GRAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Maahs

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, and thick
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does moisturize, but it is very thick and hard to put on your lips, and it's sticky, once it's on there. I used it at night for awhile, but I just don't like how hard it is to put on, and how it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kindwoman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an overnight balm. It's very sticky, but very moisturizing. Just last night I had a spot on my lip that was so chapped it cracked a little, but I put a thick layer of this stuff on it and this morning it feels way better!! It's still not completely soaked in by the morning, but I either leave whatever's left to finish absorbing throughout the day or wipe it off. Either way my lips feel 100% better in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Langeige is better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is like vaseline pretty much with a ginger smell. I don’t like it because it doesn’t absorb at all I feel like? Like if you do makeup and put it on just before it would take hours, I use the Langeige lip mask and that one spreads like butter. This is just too thick. I prefer this for overnights while I would wear langeige for mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Yuni

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very heavy product. It’s sticky and doesn’t absorb quickly (which is good since it’s an overnight mask). I originally used way too much so my lips were still sticky in the AM. Now I just barely dab my finger into the jar and pat it over my lips in a thin layer. Works great and still moisturized in the AM without all the stickiness! This jar will literally last forever at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Skips

customer_reviews.title: I mean... I guess
customer_reviews.text: I mean it lasts a long time - kind of like if you put honey on your lips - even has the same sticky consistency - but I'm not running around from friend to friend yelling, 'you guys! I found THE best lip balm for dry lips!' - It's kinda become my bedside emergency lip base for those days where I give up on how cracked they are and just want to shelter them under a layer of goo that doesn't dry out. But it's not like it's helping heal or turn over a new leaf in my search for hydrated lips.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse'sbuttpillow

customer_reviews.title: instant results
customer_reviews.text: i'm loving this product. in less than 24 hours after my first use i could tell a difference in the softness of my lips. i live in a very dry environment and could definitely drink more water, so dry lips are something i'm constantly dealing with. this is the second over night lip mask i've tried and it's WAY better than the first. the pot is big so i imagine this will last a long time. i'm very happy with this purchase. also, i have very sensitive skin and have not had any irritation or breakouts around my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Akela

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It is very sticky and not moisturizing enough. I don’t like how it’s feels on my lips. It feels like a coating on tight Vaseline like product. It doesn’t have much of a scent and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Best lip stuff you can find
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My husband bought this for me as a stocking stuffer a year ago and even after daily use I still have tons of this left. It's super sticky and even gives you a nice gloss. It doesn't soak in or lick off very easily, which means it has lots of time to heal your lips and work its magic. I highly recommend and can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: It works but the consistency is like aquaphor.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says...but I hate the consistency. I put it on while I’m in bed already every night, and what’s left on my finger is so hard to get off, petroleum like. I have miscellar water and paper towels on my nightstand now. That being said, I hate the consistency of this masque, but it works. I don’t think I’ll purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: Love love this product! Super thick lasts all night. I use a lip product during the day and I feel like this cream seals in all the good I have done and holds it in all night. Especially during these cold winter nights with the forced air heating drying us out, this lip product really protects.
customer_reviews.author: TroyKat

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past how sticky and gross it is to find out if it is helpful. When I wake up the next morning, I have to scrub my lips with soapy water and they are still sticky after. Yuck, I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's sticky and thick, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Thick as all heck, but it works. I live in an area were winters are cold and dry. The type that if you don't have a humidifier you will wake up with a bloody nose. I use this lip mask overnight to make my lips as soft as possible, but I've even begun using it during the day by putting on a layer of this lip mask, and then a layer of vaseline to make it a little more manageable (since it is so sticky). This has been my go to and for the first time ever I haven't had dry lips that crack.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: It totally works. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc it was $8 so, if it didn’t work, no harm done. I have chronically dry lips. Skin peeling off, can’t even really wear lipstick bc my lips are just flaky and it looks weird. Have tried every manner of medicated chapstick. This. Stuff. Works. Don’t wear it before kissing anyone, it’s like glue. But I put it on before bed, and I literally wake up looking like I’ve had lip injections (in a good way) and it’s just because my lips are actually hydrated for once. They stay soft and not peely for most of not all of the following day. I can wear lipstick now, and honestly I think I look younger. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very very sticky to the lips.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t deny the moisturizing effect it has, but I really dislike the texture. It’s too sticky that even Cetaphil morning cleanser can’t take it completely off. I needed to seek out for lip scrubs to remove it from my lips. If it gets to facial or even hand skin, it just doesn’t leave, not even with hand soap. And this can’t be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Super Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you're putting glue on your lips, and it gets stuck on your fingers. I haven't noticed any significant improvements after using for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, a little certainly goes a long way so this should last me a very long time! It has a sweet taste to it and it smells nice. I put it on at night before bed and wake up with it still on my lips and my lips have actually been more moisturized than they usually are, and I can never find anything that works for my dry lips.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lips!
customer_reviews.text: The best lip mask I ever own. I used La neige lip balms before but this far way better. You wake with plump and soft lips. I have the tin for 4 month and style for about a month in there and I use it every night! So it is very economical. I won’t wear it during the day because it is very thick but this is a night lip mask and it is doing his job! Try it and you won’t Regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: Best for overnight use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mask. Some things that should be noted though: It's very thick and very sticky. I bought this to put on over night and it has helped my dry and cracked lips for sure, I just glop on a thick layer at night and the next morning I'm ready to go. The smell is not overpowering and it has lasted me almost a year and has not ran out. Do not buy this if you are looking for a light lip balm. (also I got some samples so that's a plus too haha)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YASSSSSSSSSSS!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic. I have a terrible habit of biting my lips so they’re always dry and hurting. I started using aquaphor a while back and thought that was pretty great. It worked well but took about a week to completely heal my lips, but this stuff... put it on and night and I wake up with completely healed lips. It works miracles. It is quite heavy so a little goes along ways. Occasionally I wear it during the day but mostly just at not. I would highly recommend and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Overnight Lip Mask
customer_reviews.text: This lip mask is really good! I used to suffer from chapped lips often, but since I have been using it for about a year, I haven't had any more problems. I bought one for my daughter for her stocking this past Christmas and she loved it. She had the same issue as I did and it has been helping her a lot. I totally recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: 🌹Eve🌹

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, changed my life. I now have the soft, smooth lips I thought could only belong to celebrities, and child models. I enjoy not having cracked, bleeding lips. I use this every night. It is thick and sticky, and lasts until about noon the following day. It has a pleasant, sweet smell, but is not delicious in a way that would make you lick it off. It really doesn't have any flavor, being nice and neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: BEST LIP MASK EVER
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried alot of lip masks but the ones i have suckkkkk they work for lk a min and then you take it off adn theyre soft for a few minutes maybe an hour, but this ome OMFG its amazing!!!! doesnt come off during the night and just keeps them extra hyddrated!!! i LOVE it!!!! Im a skincare junkie so i had to have this!!! I initially found out about it through one of youtubes skincare must haves!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I was dealing with really dry lips for a couple months so I bought this mask. It’s very thick and sticky so definitely to only be used at night. It’s works pretty well and my dry lips are better in the morning after wearing it overnight but by noon they are back to being dry again. They dryness has definitely gotten better but not completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never liked the feeling of anything sticky on my lips but as I’m trying to get over the bad habit of biting off the dry skin, I figured I’d give this product a try and I can say it does help. When you apply it, it leaves a thick and soft layer on your lips that lasts until the morning, and the smell is good but not too strong either.
customer_reviews.author: A potato

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this out after finishing my Laneige Lip Mask. I like it so far! It's stickier than I expected, but stays on my lips the whole night. Even when I wake up in the morning, there's a thin film left. My lips definitely feel much softer. And I like there's almost no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me who hates reapplying lip balms over and over again and carry them around with you everyday, then give this a try. Just one application at night and wipe it off in the morning to notice your lips are super smooth and soft all day long until next application. I suffered from cracked lips for a long time now and nothing seemed to work so far but finally i have a winner!! One Issue with the product though its super sticky and strong moisturizer, it could get tough to even get rid of it in the morning without a proper lip scrub. Yes just washing it off with water is not going to work bdw!
customer_reviews.author: Sree

customer_reviews.title: Tacky (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more of a balm, but the mask is tacky- which I like! It stays on throughout the night but isn't sticky. It doesn't smell overwhelmingly of ginger but I can feel the ginger tingling on my lips, I think this is what makes people see more plump and firmness in the morning. Not a bad buy, it's moisturizing and doesn't make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McDonald

customer_reviews.title: I use this very night
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff & just so everyone knows it doesn't smell or taste like ginger at all. Its very. mild smelling & to be honest I don't think it even has a scent which is good for me. my lips are so smooth in the morning. This stuff is nice & thick so it stays on all night
customer_reviews.author: MCash

customer_reviews.title: You only need a little bit
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well. It is very thick and a little bit goes a very long way. It will last a long time because of that. I only use this at night and by morning it is still there. Great for dry lips or just to give you lips a boost of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Thick, sticky lip mask
customer_reviews.text: Thick, slightly uncomfortable lip mask. Not as nourishing as you would think it’d be considering the texture. Smells like orange and has a generous amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you on this one!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about purchasing this over night lip mask because of the lower price, not to mention I have extremely dry lips! Quite often when it comes to skin care, you get what you pay for right? Well, not with this product! It was so amazing I purchased another for my purse and will be purchasing more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Lips Immediately!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had dry, chapped lips for eons. I am a habitual lip biter and could never get my lips to feel silky and smooth. Any time I would try to stop biting my lips, the skin would crack and peel and I would end up chewing on my lip again. UNTIL THIS LIP MASK. I apply it every night before bed. I've only been using it for five days and my lips feel amazing. They are plump, smooth, and healthy. I feel confident wearing matte lipsticks now thanks to this product. It goes on evenly and while it feels a little heavy it wipes off clean in the morning. I love this lip mask so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Lil gem in a lil Jar
customer_reviews.text: A lot thicker than I would have preferred. It does however do the job. I’m living in a place here temps get to -10 degrees. I use this before bed and during the day. I also use it if my earlobes are irritated from wearing earrings that are non allergenic. I’d buy again. Value for money. You need very little when using.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHood

customer_reviews.title: What a nice surprise for this lip mask to be so great!!
customer_reviews.text: Used one time for an overnight treatment. The mask held up all night. The application is simple, no applicator brush needed. Lips were moisturized and felt refreshed in the morning without leaving any sticky feeling (I used cleansing milk to remove). Will definitely purchase again. Not to mention a very nice, scent that is not too strong/ but just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I thought my lips were behind repair. I couldn’t ever wear lipstick because they were so chapped and damaged. I’ve been using this for less than 2 weeks and already it has completely undone any damage on my lips. I’m so happy with this product and can’t recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Your Dad’s Baby Mama

customer_reviews.title: Works but sticky!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a month and it has helped with preventing my lips from drying/cracking overnight. It takes very little, so one jar will last quite a while. It is also very sticky and I don't enjoy kissing my partner while wearing it. Luckily it does taste good (light ginger/brown sugar flavor). Since it is so sticky, it has not been good when my cat has walked over me and swatted his tail in my face.
customer_reviews.author: LSMLN8891

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the kind of lip mask I was looking for! I've tried quite a few and most are nice, but I feel like after they wear off, my lips are just as dry. I've been using this for the last few weeks and my lips are noticeably more hydrated than they were before even during the day when I'm not using it. I will say, though, it is extremely sticky, so if you don't like that feeling, you may not like it. I like it because I feel like that keeps it on my lips longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Saved my lips!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad reaction to liquid lipstick with a sort of glittery quality that left my lips looking like I buffed them was cheese grater. There was even (sorry to be blunt) a canker like sore in the middle of my bottom lip. Healing just wouldn’t happen no matter what I used, including neosporin and a prescription cream from a dermatologist. Enter this amazing substance, which healed my lips in 2 nights use. Will continue to use as it moisturizes so well, the effects last well into the next day.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I go used to the thickness on my lips and now I love it. I use it over Arbonne's lip therapy ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not care for this. It is thick and goopy and I was pessimistic about it's efficacy, but after awhile, I go used to the thickness on my lips and now I love it. I use it over Arbonne's lip therapy (5 stars, highly recommended) at night and it is amazing. It is still on my lips in the morning!!! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: MetJet

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My lips are so soft after use. I apply it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lauterbach

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. Application is key I applied with my knuckle to really get a smooth application! It's quite sticky, a little more than an average lipgloss sticky, but otherwise it is the most moisturizing and softening lip masks I've ever tried! I'm personally a skin care fanatic so I've tried various amounts of lip masks, but this one takes the cake! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Fey Lagos

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with chapped lips and angular chelitis. It was a cycle of healing the cracks overnight only to reopen them in the morning while eating breakfast. Aquaphor was holding me over but it wasn’t actually healing my lips. Then I ordered this and OMG the cracks and splitting and finally gone. It lasts a long time on the lips as it is a very tacky formula—it doesn’t spread very easily. But this is what makes it stay on. So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to feel as beautiful as Betty White? Well, this product won't quite get you there, but it sure is a wonderful treat for any man or woman who may need a little pick-me-up. Beware of the taste! It's almost so good you want to eat it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Too think and sticky
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this. It goes on super thick and its sticky. I can't get it off my hands after applying it. It does stay on all night but I haven't noticed any change in moisture. I'll go back to using vaseline.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely sticky, which is an overnight lip mask so that’s not a huge deal. But I noticed when I used this stuff, I would wake up and feel like I had a layer of gunk on my lips. Even when I would clean my lips and try to scrub it off. It felt like it was causing my lips so feel more dry or something. It was weird. Maybe it was just my body not agreeing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trump2020Supporter!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Watched a YouTube video on dermarolling the lips. The women in the video couldn't stop sharing how great this lip mask was. I have bee using it for 2 months now and absolutely love it. If you use it at night your results come out great. I have super soft lips now. Thanks for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SnowGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Sticky but works
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff every night and can tell that if I miss a night my lips are more chapped in the morning. I like this stuff because I wake up with soft, moisturized lips. The only thing that I do not like is the fact that it is super sticky. I use my finger to apply it and even after washing my hands my finger is still sticky. Along with that my lips feel tacky. I wish it was not sticky but I appreciate that it keeps my lips feeling moist.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lip mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lip product. Probably the best I’ve ever used. I would describe it as a thick salve. It actually stays on the lips until I wipe it off, and leaves my lips the smoothest they’ve ever been throughout the entire day. Is it the most pleasant feeling when on? No, because it’s a bit sticky which is what allows it to stay on for so long-but you get used to it quickly, and it’s worth it. My one tiny disappointment is the scent. It has a pleasant light orange smell, but I was really hoping it would smell like a sweet and spicy ginger, as the name implied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Soft Lips by Morning
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly large lips, so lip care is mandatory. This overnight lip mask takes care of dead skin and fine lips. Honestly the best of numerous products I've used, from the cheapest to ridiculously expensive. I wake up and literally have pillow soft lips for the whole day. This product is part of my nightly ritual routines along with my facial care. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Shanel D

customer_reviews.title: Great For Overnight Lip Care!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price and product is great. It is a bit sticky but a good kind of sticky and it doesn’t get all over my face. I use a clean-hand knuckle to put it on and it doesn’t come off until you take it off. Totally worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This is like a salve and did nothing for lips. I put it on overnight, woke up the next day with dry lips. You're better off buying a tube of vaseline.
customer_reviews.author: Kemi

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Leniege lip mask and while I like that and it helped my dry lips some, I wasn't seeing permanent improvement. After two days of this stuff my lips have stopped peeling and are noticibly softer. Be warned it is VERY thick and VERY sticky! I don't recommend petting the cat while this is on. It's still on in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Barsotti

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting and keeps moisture in
customer_reviews.text: Scentless with a thick texture like Vaseline, this product does a good job of staying on the lips. Most lip balms disappear with the hour for me. That said, there's nothing especially moisturizing about this. It'll keep any moisture you have already but don't expect your lips to be amazing moisturized by it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: This lip mask is too sticky, it is difficult to remove from your lips and gets a bunch of dust and hair stuck in it during the night. It does stay put! However I did not feel like it did anything to heal/repair my chapped lips. It just sat on top of my lips as a protective barrier to prevent further damage, but seemed too thick to actually sink in and heal the existing dry skin damage. Does have a nice scent of ginger but I will not buy again, Carmex is cheaper and works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nissanance

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I put this on most nights before going to bed after exfoliating my lips and I wake up with the smoothest lips ☺️! The only thing I’m unsure of is if I’m supposed to leave it on or wipe it off in the morning, either way I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Vaseline
customer_reviews.text: As many other people have mentioned, this is very sticky. As far as I can tell, it's just overpriced vaseline. However it doesn't even help my lips. They're red (and sticky) in the morning. I'm also very curious about the sugar ginger part because as far as I can tell they are nonexistent. I regret buying this and cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Bee’s Knees!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this stuff is great. During the winter I suffer from horrifically chapped/cracked lips in which case most chap sticks have zero effect on healing them. Well not this bad boy! I put some on at night and wake up with soft, kissable puckers! I also have sensitive skin and usually can’t wear certain products but I’ve been using this for awhile now and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bean218

customer_reviews.title: Works great to help my accutane lips from drying out
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help my accutane lips from drying out, but it's so sticky that it's borderline impossible to remove. You can't really wipe it off with a towel and it only slightly dissolves in oil. I still have residue on my lips hours after waking up.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Really works - even after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this lip mask. I saw results just after 1 night of use even. I am so happy to have this product this winter! I have tried quite a few other chapsticks, lip balms, lip conditioners to fight chapped winter lips. Nothing has compared to this!
customer_reviews.author: KWTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, no smell no taste, just does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to reapply my lip balm many many times a day, but with this product I only apply once in the morning and once at night, and maybe once more during the day with regular lip balm. Pretty amazing! The only con, if I must say, is that it’s sticky so not very kissable with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lip mask!
customer_reviews.text: Wow Is all I can say. The day I got it, I used it that night and oh my, my lips were still hydrated the next morning. I love this lip mask.
customer_reviews.author: jessicaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best Chapstick/lip mask/lip moisturizer ever! Once you put it on, it stays on! Shield your lips from son wind cold dryness. You have my word if you use this daily your lips will be as soft as a babies ass! Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: keeps my lips moisturized all night long, i use a thinner chapstick under it and this locks that in and then i wake up to juicy soft lips. also you get alot of product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth m.

customer_reviews.title: Best lip mask in the world!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Searching high and low for ultra moisturizing lip mask that is good for sensitive skin and this is it. My next favorite is Innisfree honey lip balm but this one is even better. Leaves lips super soft in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with dry lips for years. It only got worse when I got braces. This has been a game change! I use it at night before bed. I found that I’m using less chapstick. My only regret is not finding it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all night!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does stay on all night, in the morning my lips are soft and plump! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jade liborio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product the day I got it and OH MY GOD IT IS SO GOOD! I exfoliated my lips the first time I used it and I guess that helped the product settle in. It worked really well, my lips were so chapped before this mask. I put it on at night, it’s really sticky but I guess it’s doing the job. In the morning my lips are softer and normal lip balms work better. You get a lot of product in packaging so it’s a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of expensive lip balms and this actually makes a difference. I put on a thin layer before going to bed most nights, and I noticed a difference overnight. I had dry cracking lips all the time and this has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: ARene

customer_reviews.title: BEST lip balm
customer_reviews.text: This lip treatment is by far the BEST in keeping your lips moist. I wear it overnight and stays on the lips throughout the night. You will wake up with it still on your lips
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: no noticeable differences
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do anything for me that a lip balm couldnt do. I tried it for about a month and a half. Maybe due to the winter months and cold, my lips just tend to get more dry. I had better results with Burt's Bee lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: RadMom

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip product I've ever used. If you have a hard time making lipsticks and tints look nice because of dry, flaky lips, look no further. Just apply a coat of this at night and you'll get smooth and supple lips that lasts the whole day. It is thick but not too sticky unless you use your fingers to apply...then it's a mess! You really need a separate applicator.
customer_reviews.author: angie

product_meta.title: Aritaum Ginger Sugar Overnight Lip Mask, 0.3 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:StandardKeeping the powerful moisturizing for 24 hrs. After 24 hrs. to apply, increased 17.5% of the moisture on lips. Before going to bed to apply as the sleeping pack on lips, increased by 22.8% of the moisture Making as the smooth lips. Containing the high-moisturizing natural Shea Butter, Beeswax, Murumuru butter: Making the moisture-keeping-film on lips. Long Lasting Moisturizing.
feature_bullets: Keeping the powerful moisturizing for 24 hrs. After 24 hrs. to apply
Increased 17.5% of the moisture on lips. Before going to bed to apply as the sleeping pack on lips
Increased by 22.8% of the moisture Making as the smooth lips. Containing the high-moisturizing natural Shea Butter

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
